00020 BusIfInterfaceMaster::BusIfInterfaceMaster(General::InterfaceMode mode,
00021                                                                                    BusInterface* busif,
00022                                                                                    QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00023                                                                                    QWidget *parent):
00024 BusIfInterfaceModeEditor(busif, parent), mode_(mode),
00025 addressSpaceRef_(this), 
00026 baseAddress_(this), 
00027 prompt_(this), 
00028 attributes_(this, tr("Base address attributes")),
00029 component_(component) {
00030 
00031         connect(&addressSpaceRef_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00032                 this, SLOT(onIndexChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00033         
00034         QFormLayout* addressLayout = new QFormLayout();
00035         addressLayout->addRow(tr("Address space:"), &addressSpaceRef_);
00036 
00037         QFormLayout* baseAddressLayout = new QFormLayout();
00038         baseAddressLayout->addRow(tr("Base address:"), &baseAddress_);
00039 
00040         QFormLayout* promptLayout = new QFormLayout();
00041         promptLayout->addRow(tr("Prompt:"), &prompt_);
00042 
00043         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00044         topLayout->addWidget(&attributes_);
00045         topLayout->addLayout(addressLayout);
00046         topLayout->addLayout(baseAddressLayout);
00047         topLayout->addLayout(promptLayout);
00048         
00049         restoreChanges();
00050 }

00052 BusIfInterfaceMaster::~BusIfInterfaceMaster() {
00053 }
00054 
00055 bool BusIfInterfaceMaster::isValid() const {
00056         
00057         // if address space ref is not defined but some other element is
00058         if (addressSpaceRef_.currentText().isEmpty() &&
00059                 (!baseAddress_.text().isEmpty() || 
00060                 !prompt_.text().isEmpty() ||
00061                 !attributes_.isEmpty()))
00062                 return false;
00063 
00064         return true;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void BusIfInterfaceMaster::restoreChanges() {
00068 
00069         updateDisplay();
00070 
00071         int index = -1;
00072         QString baseAddress;
00073         QString prompt;
00074         attributes_.clear();
00075 
00076         if (busIf()->getMaster()) {
00077                 index = addressSpaceRef_.findText(busIf()->getMaster()->getAddressSpaceRef());
00078                 baseAddress = busIf()->getMaster()->getBaseAddress();
00079                 prompt = busIf()->getMaster()->getPrompt();
00080                 attributes_.setAttributes(busIf()->getMaster()->getBaseAttributes());
00081         }
00082         addressSpaceRef_.setCurrentIndex(index);
00083         baseAddress_.setText(baseAddress);
00084         prompt_.setText(prompt);
00085 
00086         onIndexChanged();
00087 }
00088 
00089 void BusIfInterfaceMaster::applyChanges() {
00090 
00091         if (!isValid())
00092                 return;
00093 
00094         busIf()->setInterfaceMode(mode_);
00095 
00096         // if address space ref is defined
00097         if (!addressSpaceRef_.currentText().isEmpty()) {
00098                 busIf()->getMaster()->setAddressSpaceRef(addressSpaceRef_.currentText());
00099                 busIf()->getMaster()->setBaseAddress(baseAddress_.text());
00100                 busIf()->getMaster()->setPrompt(prompt_.text());
00101                 busIf()->getMaster()->setBaseAttributes(attributes_.getAttributes());
00102         }
00103 
00104         // if address space ref was not defined then other elements must be empty
00105 
00106 }
00107 
00108 void BusIfInterfaceMaster::updateDisplay() {
00109 
00110         addressSpaceRef_.clear();
00111 
00112         addressSpaceRef_.addItems(component_->getAddressSpaceNames());
00113 }
00114 
00115 void BusIfInterfaceMaster::onIndexChanged() {
00116 
00117         // if address space is not referenced then other elements cant exist either
00118         if (addressSpaceRef_.currentText().isEmpty()) {
00119                 baseAddress_.setDisabled(true);
00120                 prompt_.setDisabled(true);
00121                 attributes_.setDisabled(true);
00122         }
00123         else {
00124                 baseAddress_.setEnabled(true);
00125                 prompt_.setEnabled(true);
00126                 attributes_.setEnabled(true);
00127         }
00128 }
00129 
00130 General::InterfaceMode BusIfInterfaceMaster::getInterfaceMode() const {
00131         return mode_;
00132 }
